mods.abstract: Class Prophecy. is now a great D.S. teacher in one of the largest schools in the U.S.A., Channey. also author of several D S. text books. my isn't it strange how the rose even keeps the twins together. Upon plucking the next petal I read the name of Dimple Johnson who is now a happily married wife of a leading physician and has become the mother of three of the most beautiful little children. My this is interesting and plucking the next, I read the name of Louis Kohlheim who is doing social work in N.Y. One of the city's best also happily married to a young man of that city, who is doing government work. I at last plucked another petal and read the name of Florence B. Lovell who has at last won long coveted College Diploma realize to some extent the ideals of her dreams with modest home, whose greatest adornment is a piano and kitchen with all modern conveniences.
